game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: In a mystical world, an ancient artifact with incredible power has been lost. You have been chosen as the hero destined to find and retrieve it. Embark on a perilous journey filled with challenges and mystery to uncover the whereabouts of the artifact and bring it back to its rightful place.

task.description: Travel to the forgotten temple of the Ancients and find the key that unlocks the entrance to the artifact's resting place.

task.objective: Solve the riddles of the Guardians
task.description: Within the temple, face the ancient Guardians and solve their mind-bending riddles to prove your worth and gain access to the inner chambers.
task.location: Inner Chambers of the Forgotten Temple

task.description: Deep within the temple, a labyrinth of traps and illusions awaits. Use your wit and agility to outsmart the maze and reach the final chamber.

task.objective: Battle the ancient guardian of the artifact
task.description: As you approach the artifact, a fearsome guardian stands in your way. Engage in a fierce battle, utilizing all your skills, to defeat the guardian and claim the artifact.
